content:
I'm a bit disappointed to see that if you pass all Inferno tests that there are no hidden tests to unlock :D
Jokes aside, I wanted to say thank you for these awesome tests. While implementing the tests, it helped enormously and covered some very interesting edge cases. Hope to see such an extensive test coverage for more implementation guides.

Screenshot-2021-02-26-at-11.14.08.png

Thanks for the feedback! Glad they were helpful. We do have dozens of optional (SHOULD) tests that are disabled/hidden for ONC Standardized API certification right now, but we would like to allow users to enable them if they are interested in going above/beyond the minimum requirements. An unlocking mechanism after you complete all the SHALL tests would be fun way for that to work ;-)
